article.headline: San Francisco 77, Pepperdine 47
article.story: SAN FRANCISCO -- Angelo Caloiaro scored a career-high 21 points as San Francisco rolled to a 77-47 victory over Pepperdine on Thursday night. Caloiaro also set a career high with five 3-pointers, which accounted for all 15 of his second-half points. Rashad Green posted his first double-double at San Francisco with 10 points and a career-high 14 rebounds, and Dior Lowhorn added 18 points to jump up two spots and move into fifth place on the school's career scoring list. The Dons (10-15, 5-5 West Coast Conference) seized control with a 21-2 run to close the first half. The Waves (7-18, 3-6) never recovered, thanks largely to a 30.5 percent shooting night, their second-worst performance this season. Keion Bell led Pepperdine with 13 points on 5-for-21 shooting.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
